name: 𝐿𝒶𝓃𝒶  :verifiedtrans: (@LadyDragonfly@universeodon.com)
summary:
Every single person I know is currently at Grade A, Defcon-1, Ultra Premium Level exhaustion right now. So if you're scanning social media and this applies to you, let this be your motivational speech. 

DON'T do thing.
DON'T go get it girl.
STAY in bed.
ORDER in.
EAT some soup.
TAKE a nap.
REST is not failure.
REST does not make you weak.
REST is not laziness.
REST is self care.
REST.
